about_the_game:
It’s just a red tomato wearing a silly hat. He tries to look like a cool tomb raider, rolling and jumping across the maps. Help him find all the treasures in the mystic castle, or watch him meet a variety of painful ends.

Tomato Jones 2 is the sequel to the immensely fun predecessor, Tomato Jones, which is already available on Steam.

This physics-based puzzle/adventure game combines classic RPG platforming gameplay with the skill-driven style of ball-rolling games. Your goal is to collect all the coins and the hidden golden artifact at the end of each level while avoiding various dangerous traps, obstacles, and enemies.

The game captures the spirit of Indiana Jones movies while aiming to be as funny and humorous as possible.

NEW FEATURES

  • 30 beautiful and challenging levels (10 more than its predecessor)

  • Stunning "soft body" tomato physics and significantly improved graphics

  • Many new and dangerous traps

  • Innovative camera movement and viewing angles

  • Completely new world map with areas to explore

  • Fun soundtrack and sound effects

  • Multiple funny hats to choose from

  • Tons of ketchup

And hey.. you can still drive mine carts! 😉

Tomato Jones 2 is harder than its predecessor, and we highly recommend playing the first game, Tomato Jones, as well.
